title: Nice car - but whats that font??
content:
Please could someone help me identify the typeface displayed on the new MG6 (red one) on the reg plate.

[http://www.aronline.co.uk/wordpress/tag/mg-6/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016092739/http:/www.aronline.co.uk/wordpress/tag/mg-6/ "http://www.aronline.co.uk/wordpress/tag/mg-6/")

Or something vaguely similar....??? Many thanks
author: bungle_face

comments.content:
I made this using CG Fiedler Gothic, with a bunch of Squooshing and slanting.I don't say I think this is what they used, but it might be close enough without too much font hunting. The 'cutout' is from an obliqued rounded white rectangle behind MG, but in front of the 6.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016092739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MG6Sim_4291.gif)
